author: John G. Cleary and Leonard E. Trigg
title: Experiences with OB1, An Optimal Bayes Decision Tree Learner
venue: Department of Computer Science University of Waikato
window: all the information in vote is contained in one attribute, and for iris two attributes contain all the class information (although most of this can be obtained using only one attribute).
